Campli can be reached by the A24 Autostrada from Rome (exit Teramo), or from the A14 Autostrada between Ancona and Bari (Exit Mosciano St. Angelo.
This is a very small town and is easily walkable.

value: Scala Santa (Sacred Staircase) - provides the same priviliges of indulgence as the Holy Stairs of the Pretorio in Rome.
The National Archaeological Museum in Abruzzo.
Interesting exhibition that includes items from the Bronze Age (14th - 13th Century BC), and from 9th and 7th Century BC Necropoli
Sagra e Profano - town festival held in mid-July featuring bands, dancing and esecially, local food delicacies.  Featured are dishes made with rare, indigenous tartufi (truffles).
